    • Method Detail

      • setUpgradePolicy

        public HardwareTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setUpgradePolicy(HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy upgradePolicy)
        Scheduled upgrade policy.

        If set to HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy.NEVER, the HardwareTypes.Info.getUpgradeVersion() property will be reset to null.

        If null, the value is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        upgradePolicy - New value for the property.

      • setUpgradeVersion

        public HardwareTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setUpgradeVersion(HardwareTypes.Version upgradeVersion)
        Target hardware version to be used on the next scheduled virtual hardware upgrade.

        If specified, this property must represent a newer virtual hardware version than the current virtual hardware version reported in HardwareTypes.Info.getVersion().

        If HardwareTypes.UpdateSpec.getUpgradePolicy() is set to HardwareTypes.UpgradePolicy.NEVER, this property must be null. Otherwise, if this property is null, default to the most recent virtual hardware version supported by the server.
        Parameters:
        upgradeVersion - New value for the property.

      • build

        public HardwareTypes.UpdateSpec build()
